subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: After all that Clippers fans have endured — the 15-victory season, the string of lottery picks that went bust, the trades that backfired and the free agents who fled — this is the ultimate payoff. Clippers in, Lakers out.
snippet: After all that Clippers fans have endured — the 15-victory season, the string of lottery picks that went bust, the trades that backfired and the free agents who fled — this is the ultimate payoff. Clippers in, Lakers out.
